price: Ampa sε Yama wo ‘Sab’al Masaani’ Nsεm pͻ nson a yεtaa kenkan de bͻ Nyankopͻn abodin εna Qur’aan Kεseε no.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynāka sabʿan mina al-mathānī wal-qur'āna al-ʿaẓīma
